entry.title: Is My Toddler a Stochastic Parrot?
entry.quote: The world is racing to develop ever more sophisticated large language models while a small language model unfurls itself in my home.

entry.title: A Failed AI Girlfriend Product, and My Lessons
entry.quote: But, does humanity really need an AI friend?

entry.title: https://mazzzystar.github.io/2023/11/16/ai-girlfriend-product/
entry.quote: Coding has always felt to me like an endlessly deep and rich domain. Now I find myself wanting to write a eulogy for it.

entry.title: DAK and the Golden Age of Gadget Catalogs
entry.quote: Here’s a catalog, from a guy who chooses cool gadgets, and writes about them in great detail, every word his own. Sounds fun. And then, you dig in.

entry.title: Capturing One Million Deaths on a Page: A Chat with NYT’s Carrie Mifsud
entry.quote: When I was asked to do this, I knew it would have to have news value, be informative, be sophisticated but also carry the weight of the loss somehow. I was looking for a way to do all of that.
